description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Decorate your own christmas tree ! Have fun with your family while decorating tree together. Decorate tree and admire stunning effects: fully dynamic per pixel lighting, wind effects, snow and look how whole tree sways in the wind ! You can play up to 8 christmas songs.
description.short: Decorate your own christmas tree ! Have fun with your family while decorating tree together. Decorate tree and admire stunning effects: fully dynamic per pixel lighting, wind effects, snow and look how whole tree sways in the wind ! You can play up to 8 christmas songs.
